`cs_oracle` (sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" OR sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified") | fields user | stats count by user

search.query: `cs_oracle` sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" $tkn_host$ ACTION IN (4, 5, 8, 12, 17, 18, 22, 41, 51, 52, 53, 54, 108, 109, 114, 115, 203, 229, 230, 231) | fillnull value="-" | eval action_name = coalesce(vendor_action, ACTION_NAME), database_name = coalesce(DB_UNIQUE_NAME, database_name), schema_name = coalesce(OBJECT_SCHEMA, schema_name), object_name = coalesce(object, OBJECT_NAME), object_type = coalesce(object_category, AUDIT_TYPE), db_user = coalesce(DATABASE_USER, DBUSERNAME), client_app = coalesce(CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME, client_app), statement = coalesce(command, SQL_TEXT), status = if(RETURNCODE==0 or RETURN_CODE==0, "success", "failure") | search $tkn_user$ $tkn_action_name$ $tkn_object_type$ $tkn_object$ | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)` | table event_time host user db_user action_name schema_name database_name object_name object_type src client_app statement status

`cs_oracle` (sourcetype="oracle:audit:xml" OR sourcetype="oracle:audit:unified") $tkn_host$ | eval action_name = coalesce(vendor_action, ACTION_NAME), database_name = coalesce(DB_UNIQUE_NAME, database_name), schema_name = coalesce(OBJECT_SCHEMA, schema_name), object_name = coalesce(object, OBJECT_NAME), object_type = coalesce(object_category, AUDIT_TYPE), db_user = coalesce(DB_User, DBUSERNAME), client_app = coalesce(CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME, client_app), statement = coalesce(command, SQL_TEXT), status = if(RETURNCODE==0 or RETURN_CODE==0, "success", "failure"), db_host = host | fillnull value="-" user object_name | search $tkn_user$ $tkn_action_name$ $tkn_object_type$ $tkn_object$ | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)` | table event_time host db_host user action_name schema_name database_name object_name object_type src db_user client_app statement status
